Introduction¶

This document is written for introduce the project “Reconnaissance des émotions”.

The project contains the following four components.

  1. Extract the image from the image database and classify it to form the original database.
process_dataset.py
  1. Image pre-processing, in order to improve the speed and accuracy of expression recognition. Brightness Normalization and Geometric Normalization

adjust.py

preProcessing.py

  1. The recognition part, extracting the feature value of the human face from the picture.

extractFeaturesCoordinates.py

FaceLand.py

setFeaturesData.py : Save features data to the text files.

utilText.py : I/O functions.

  1. The expression recognition section, predict and use the kNN classification method to classify the result.

getLatentSpace.py

knn.py

RunMe.py : Main function.

This is the package diagram of this project.
